scenario_text.value:
Hmm, there’s nothing around here. Maybe we
should look farther inside?

We may be overlooking something. And if we
rush inside, we may run right into enemies.
We should keep checking these nearby areas.
Yeah, but still...

Hmm... What do you think is the best course
of action, Takuma?

(I think we should search around here, but
Renamon said to go farther in... Hard call.)
(Hmm, well I think that...)
Shuuji’s right.
Saki’s right.
...You’re both right.
Shuuji’s right.
Shuuji’s right. We should avoid any danger.
You think so?
Yes, I do. You’re against it, Saki?
It’s not that...

It’s just, Renamon said we should go in
deeper.

But who knows? We may find a clue or two
around here, too.
Saki’s right.
Saki’s right. If we trust Renamon’s info...

There has to be something happening around
here.
So you say, but...

But why don’t we comb this area first, then
go in once we’re sure there’s nothing here?
Well... That makes sense to me.

Thanks for saying so. Now, let’s keep looking
around here. Better hurry.
...You’re both right.

...You’re both right. I honestly don’t know
what to do.

You’re not helping, Takuma. Are you feeling
tired?

Yeah, that’s not something you’d usually say.
You okay?
I’m fine! Sorry to worry you.
If you say so...

Should we shift our search to a different
area? I think we’re done here.
...Gotcha. Okay, let’s go.
(They both ran off...)

(Where in the world is that Holy
Beast?)

No luck here... Let’s look a little bit more,
then head inside like Saki suggested.

I’ll do another once-over here. You check out
another spot, Takuma!
